name: Catnip Corner
description: Catnip Corner makes the classic tales come to life. The gameplay follows Gus the kitten through the gameplay. The player will watch Gus go from mischievous to understanding and caring of others. Gus will be going through the forest to find his and his sister’s lost mittens. Through the forest, the player will come across many different characters that will be either friendly and helpful or scary and nonhelpful. The player must figure out quickly and smartly which ones they are. The game will be full of many different puzzles for the player to solve. There will be many different mechanics the player will use. The character will be able to climb over climbable objects. Be able to lift only liftable objects. look through and find objects inside lockable items. The character will also be able to walk, run, crawl, and kneel.
